queries.name: main_query
queries.query: http://mousebird.cartodb.com/api/v2/sql?format=GeoJSON&q=SELECT table_10m_admin_0_map_subunits.the_geom, une_measurements.nation_id,une_measurements.data_set_id,une_measurements.measurement FROM table_10m_admin_0_map_subunits inner join une_nations on table_10m_admin_0_map_subunits.adm0_a3 = une_nations.iso3 inner join une_measurements on une_nations.id = une_measurements.nation_id WHERE ST_Intersects(table_10m_admin_0_map_subunits.the_geom,ST_SetSRID(ST_Point({taplon},{taplat}),4326)) AND une_measurements.data_set_id = {data_set}
